titles.title: To amend section 207 of title 18, United States Code, to increase to 5 years the period during which former Members of Congress may not engage in certain lobbying activities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution.

bill.summary: 1/9/1997--Introduced. Increases to five years (currently, one year) after leaving office the period during which former Members of Congress and elected officers are prohibited from engaging in certain lobbying activities.
